body:
Wall Street renowned brokerages following Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) have now given a mean price target of $137.727 on its stock. After accomplishing a methodical study, the analysts have specified a target price range.

The intense high range is put at $199 while the lowest price is $62. It is the mean price reached following the Zacks poll. In addition to this price estimate, the leading brokerages have announced the earnings estimates for Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX).

For the quarter, the forecasted EPS stands at $0.37 for Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX). The report is likely to be publicized on or around 2017-04-17. As per the latest update, the firm’s EPS came at $0.15 for the period ended 2016-12-31.

Zacks study examines the projections given by renowned brokerages in the industry. The hold, buy and sell recommendations are compiled to get an average rating on a 1-5 scale. It is a reducing scale, which can be conveniently decoded by shareholders. Brokers deploy unique mechanisms to get individual Buy/Sell references.

On the contrary, Zacks gets a consensus analyst rating on the stock. Value scores approaching towards 1 means a buy recommendation and rating of 5 is considered bearish for stock. Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX)’s rating score is 2.13 based on 33 stock views.

Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) probably will achieve EPS of $1.11 in next year. The experts have a positive EPS target of $1.38 for the company while the lowest estimate for the year is set at $0.78 year.

title: The Growth Forecast For Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) | The Markets Daily
